DOC.brief_title: Prognostic Impact Anatomical Resection Vs. Non-anatomical Resection HCC
DOC.detailed_description: Whether anatomical good non anatomical resection HCC still debate . This prospective randomized study aim address approach well term patient prognosis .
DOC.criteria: patient affect single HCC patient liver resection indicate HCC without vascular invasion and/or thrombosis multinodular HCC metastatic disease spontaneous tumor rupture
